topic_metadata.title: Is it possible to add a symbol when a line is broken in a raw block (code block)?

posts.name: Electron Wizard
posts.cooked:
Hello,

Is it possible to define a symbol, which will be appended to a breakline (when the code line is too long and has to wrap to a new line)?

As in the following image with the green arrows?

Any help is appreciated!
posts.raw:
Hello,

posts.cooked: While this isn’t exactly what you want, the Codly package can do something similar with its “Smart indentation” feature.
posts.raw: While this isn't *exactly* what you want, the [Codly](https://typst.app/universe/package/codly) package can do something similar with its "Smart indentation"  feature.
